title: The 2016 Truth About Fat Loss Summit, 25 April - 1 May 2016
description:
The Truth About Fat Loss includes the worldâ€™s top experts discussing:

+ Hormones 
+ Diets from A-Z 
+ The psychology of weight loss 
+ Gluten and other food sensitivities 
+ The role of stress 
+ The microbiome and what it means to your waistline 
+ Hidden factors in weight gain 
+ More efficient (and shorter!) fat burning exercise

Day 1 - Monday, April 25
Jonny Bowden, PhD, CNS - Why Everything You Learned About Weight Loss Is Wrong!
Donna Gates, M.Ed, ABAAHP - The Body Ecology Program
Sara Gottfried, MD - Resetting Your Hormones
Jade Teta, ND - What to Do When Diet and Exercise Stop Working

Day 2 - Tuesday, April 26
John Rowley - The Physiology of Success
Kellyann Petrucci, MS, ND - Why the L.A. Lakers Drink Bone Broth
Anna Cabeca, MD - The Truth About Acid-Alkaline
Alan Christianson, NMD - Healing Your Adrenals
Drew Canole - From Fat to Fit

Day 3 - Wednesday, April 27
Barry Sears, PhD - The Hormonal Effect of Food
Ann Louise Gittleman, PhD, CNS - Banishing the Fear of Fat Forever
Mira Calton, CN, FAAIM, DCCN, CMS, CPFC, BCIH and Jayson B. Calton, PhD, FAAIM, DCCN, CMS, CISSN, BCIH, ROHP - The Hidden Reason You Gain Weight: Micronutrient Deficiency
Tami Meraglia, MD - The Hormone Secret

Day 4 - Thursday, April 28
Dan Kalish, DC - How Toxins Make You Gain Weight (And What to Do About It!)
Susanne Bennett, DC - Energy, Weight Loss and the Mitochondria
Josh Axe, DNM, DC, CNS - Hidden Causes of Weight-Loss Resistance
Sayer Ji - What Research Really Tells Us About Weight Loss

Day 5 - Friday, April 29
Elizabeth Lombardo, PhD - The Psychology of Weight Loss
Marc David, MA - The Psychology of Eating
Cynthia Pasquella - Transformational Nutrition
David Perlmutter, MD, FACN, ABIHM - The Brain-Belly Connection
Daniel Amen, MD - The Brain Warriorâ€™s Way

Day 6 - Saturday, April 30
Tom Oâ€™Bryan, DC, CCN, DACBN - Gluten, Food Sensitivities, Hormones and Fat Loss
Dietitian Cassie, Registered & Licensed Dietitian - The Unmaking of a Dietitian

Day 7 - Sunday, May 1
Eric Westman, MD MHS and Jimmy Moore - Weight Loss on a Ketogenic Diet
Steven Masley, MD, FAHA, FAAFP, FACN, CNS, CCD - The Smart Fat Program for Weight Loss
Marcie Peters, Certified Holistic Health & Life Coach - Aging Backwards
Jimmy Smith, MS, CSCS - The Secret of Success
Dave Asprey - A High-Fat Diet for a Low-Fat Body

This is critical information concerning the long term health of diabetics and heart disease which should be freely available to the public. Please share and seed generously to keep this torrent alive for years to come. 

Downloaded from http://truthaboutfatlosssummit.com/ on Monday, May 2, 2016
